document.full_text: the operator of japan's quake-stricken nuclear power plant was preparing on thursday to spray water into the complex's no.3 reactor, tokyo electric power said.
document.title: japan nuclear workers prepare to spray water at reactor no.3
lines_and_colors: the operator of japan's quake-stricken nuclear power plant was preparing on thursday to spray water into the complex's no.3 reactor, tokyo electric power said.
